title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dreamSnakes are live animals that harm people, and when the dreamer sees them in a dream, he is worried about the interpretation of this vision...snakes, according to leading scholars and commentators.Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dreamWhen the dreamer sees snakes in a dream, this could be a sign of the presence of harmful people In his life they are trying to deceive him into falling into a trap. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there are snakes trying to enter the house but they do not enter in the end, this means that there are some obstacles that he faces in order to achieve his goals in the end. If one sees snakes in a dream trying to approach From him, this means that there are some friends who are trying to get close to the dreamer to achieve their interests. If the dreamer is afraid of a snake in a dream, this indicates the weakness of his character and his fear of confronting those who are pursuing him. Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Snakes in a dream indicate that you are hearing bad news. However, the interpretation may differ depending on the dreamer’s location and the location of the snake. If the dreamer sees that the snake is coiled in a circular motion, this is a sign of the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life who is pleased with his appearance and is exposed to crises. Seeing a snake in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to financial and moral crises, and when the dreamer is killed A snake in a dream means that he will triumph over his enemies. If the snake is savage in the dream, this is evidence that the enemy is not considered close to the dreamer, but rather someone he knows, but there is no connection between them. Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream for a single womanWhen an unmarried woman sees a snake in In a dream, this symbolizes that she is a person who likes to gossip and talk about others, and this is undesirable, and she must repent for that. A snake in a dream for a girl can indicate many problems surrounding that girl, and if the girl is a student at school and she sees a snake in the dream, This means that she will face many obstacles while studying, but she will struggle and succeed in the end. Seeing snakes in a girl’s dream is a sign of the presence of enemies and haters out of jealousy and hatred for that girl. If an unmarried girl is bitten by a snake, this is a sign that she will fall into great misfortune. And she cannot escape from them. What is the interpretation of a dream of many snakes in the house for single women? A large number of snakes in a dream is evidence of her failure or separation from work, and when a girl sees that there are a large number of snakes in the workplace and they are trying to catch them, this symbolizes the presence of people in Workers who talk bad about her because the manager fires her from the job. If a girl sees that there are small snakes, this means that she will meet new people who will deceive her and hate her forever. Seeing many snakes in the dream of an unmarried woman may mean that someone will propose to her and deceive her in the name of love from In order to benefit from them. A dream of escaping from snakes could be a sign that you will escape a great misfortune, and this dream also indicates that you will escape from enemies. What is the interpretation of a dream about snakes?

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother: Dreams are an outlet for the thoughts, obsessions, fears, and desires that go on in a person’s subconscious mind, and many of us dream of things that make him very happy, as well as some dreams that fill your soul with them. Fear and dread are like dreaming of the death of a mother, which is the subject of our article today. Let us find out what a dream of a mother’s death means. The death of a mother in a dream. The true believer also believes in God’s will and destiny and does not rely on the interpretation of dreams to know what will happen in the future or make any decision based on his dream. It should also be noted that Interpretation of dreams is a speculative science and not a metaphysical science, because only Almighty God knows the unseen. Although the dream of a mother’s death is a heartbreaking and frightening matter, it has many connotations and interpretations that we will explain in the following lines: If the mother dies in a dream without burying her, this indicates her condition. Good luck and achieving some things that make her feel stable and comfortable. But if the mother is buried in the dream, she must turn to those around her to advise her to repent and return to God and not disobey Him. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that his mother died and people brought her coffin and attended her funeral, this indicates a high status. And that this mother will enjoy status and power. The death of the mother in a dream. There is someone who sees in a dream that his mother died but came back to life, and this indicates that this mother will commit a sin and then repent to God Almighty. This vision explains the long life of the mother, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the mother sees that she will not die. This means that this mother will be martyred for the sake of God Almighty. Her funeral, this indicates the destruction of her home, may God bless all our mothers. If the mother appears dead for some time while she is in her grave, this means that this mother is traveling far and the period of her travel will be long, but the mother must be careful because she may be exposed to bad and immoral things from people close to her. Of which. For her. But if the fortuneteller sees his mother washing, this indicates her repentance and return to God Almighty after sins and disobedience. As for whoever sees his mother lying on the washing bed while she is alive, this indicates that his mother will work in the court of the king or sultan. Follow the mother’s death in A dream: As for someone who sees his mother in the throes of death, this indicates that this mother has wronged herself and she must repent to God Almighty and ask for forgiveness. Likewise, there are those who see that his mother has died, but her appearance is different from the appearance of the dead. This indicates that this mother will destroy her home, demolish it, and remove it in a very bad way. May God bless all mothers. As for whoever bears witness that his mother is in the shroud, this indicates the approach of her guardianship. May God prolong the life of all mothers. Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s grave. Here, scholars interpret seeing graves in a dream in general, and the matter is not limited to seeing the mother’s grave only, as seeing A grave in a dream has many connotations, including: If a person sees that he is digging a grave, this means that this person will build a house in the same country in which the grave was dug in the dream and will reside in that house. As for whoever sees that he is demolishing a grave, this indicates the long life of the owner. This dream improves his health and its continuity

title: Interpretation of lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Today we will present to you the interpretation of lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing vegetables in a dream indicates that a lot of good will come to the dreamer, and lettuce is one of the vegetables that many people see in their dreams, and seeing it has many meanings, such as getting what one wants and seeing lettuce in a dream. It is a warning and alert sign from a person, or problems and problems, so we will show you lettuce in a dream in this article in the encyclopedia through the following lines. Interpretation of lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing lettuce in a dream as a sign of the coming of a lot of goodness, but Sometimes it can indicate evil. Whoever sees in a dream that lettuce begins to grow in his house, it means that the dreamer will receive bad news, but after this bad news, the dreamer will see great joy. Seeing lettuce in a dream means that the dreamer is healthy and well. Good and does not suffer from any disease. But if the dreamer sees himself eating lettuce in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from an illness in the near future. If one sees in his dream that he is eating lettuce, this means that he will leave one of the people close to his heart. If he sees In a dream, a person eats lettuce. This may indicate that the dreamer suffers from malnutrition and must take good care of his food in order to maintain his health and not contract diseases. However, if a woman dreams that she planted lettuce and the color of the lettuce was black, this indicates that this woman will contract a disease. And it is the reason for that. If a person sees in his dream that he is picking lettuce, this means that the dreamer has a lot of hatred for others and may cause many problems for those around him as a result of his envy and hatred. But if a person sees lettuce in his dream, this indicates that his life is easy and easy. Interpretation of lettuce In a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees lettuce in a dream, this means that she will hear bad news. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying lettuce, this means that she will get a lot of goodness in her life, and she will achieve all her goals and desires, and she will get a lot of money. And the girl’s vision An unmarried woman cutting lettuce in her dream shows that she will get rid of all the crises and problems that she will face in her life. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is planting lettuce, this indicates her strong will and determination to achieve her goals. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is eating lettuce in her dream, This indicates the crises that this girl will face in her life, but these problems and crises will end after a short time. Interpretation of lettuce in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees lettuce in a dream, this means that the woman is in good health and that this woman does not suffer from any disease. But if A married woman who sees that she is growing dark-colored lettuce indicates that this woman will be affected by a disease in the near future. A married woman who sees lettuce at the beginning of its growth in her dream indicates that there is someone near her who wants to harm her, but God Almighty will reveal it to her. If a married woman sees In her dream that she is eating lettuce, it means that she is a responsible person and that...

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing the veil in an unmarried woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream: The veil is usually used to cover a woman’s hair, so only her face can be seen. The bride, and in our topic today we will learn about all of these interpretations. Throwing her in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said in interpreting this vision that it indicates purity and good character because this veil only shows her face. If it flies from her head, this is evidence of problems in her life. If in reality she is not veiled and sees someone wearing a veil over her head, this is evidence of her desire to get closer to God and that the woman with the vision is distinguished by the purity of her heart, which makes her accept her. To wear the hijab soon. A woman who sees herself showing part of her hair in a dream with a veil on her head, this indicates that she is characterized by hypocrisy and wishes to appear different from what she actually is. As for the man who sees that he has covered his head, this, in the eyes of Ibn Sirin, expresses status. The high status of a man and his high status in society. Throwing in an individual’s dream. The veil in an unmarried girl’s dream shows many signs, all of which are worthy of praise and positivity, as long as she wears the veil and does not take it off. If a girl of marriageable age sees this veil, this indicates the imminence of her engagement and the entry of joy and happiness. To her life in the very near future. But if she sees someone who puts her on her head, then this person is on her way to propose to her and will be her husband and support. A girl who has an ambition to find a specific job so that she can rely on herself. Her vision indicates that her desire will come true and she will find a suitable job that will provide her with sufficient income and will not make her need everyone. The young girl who is still studying her vision shows that she has obtained high grades in the exams. The vision is psychological support for the girl to complete her studies and excel. As for the white veil, it is a sign of the approaching wedding veil for her. The vision of an unmarried woman indicates that her life will change for the better than it was, and if she is going through a period of crisis, she will overcome it soon. If a man buys a veil for a girl She is not married yet, so this indicates that he is thinking about her and wants her to be his wife. The veil in an unmarried woman’s dream, from Al-Nabulsi’s point of view, indicates purity, chastity, a good reputation, and a fragrant conduct among the people. Interpretation of a dream about a black veil for a single woman: The vision shows the purity and chastity of this girl’s bed And if she takes it out in a dream in front of a man she does not know, this indicates her emotional relationship with this man. It can also indicate a final trip for individuals and that this trip will bring them great benefit. The black color of the hijab indicates the girl’s piety and good morals. The hijab in a dream for a married womanFor a married woman The vision indicates that she will protect her home and her husband, because she is a woman distinguished by purity and piety. But if she buys the hijab, she will go through a state of happiness, calm, and stability after a period of strife and turmoil. The vision also indicates her closeness to God, and her maintaining obedience to His commands, and abstaining from what He has forbidden ( Glory be to Him. The long veil indicates her stable life with her children and Zo

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband running on green ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a husband running on green land in a dream by scholars. The site has nothing to do with interpretations, but rather by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a husband running on green land in a dream: Seeing a wife working on green land may mean that she will get a lot of money In those days. Whoever dreams that a husband was running on green land may indicate great wealth that he could acquire after the poverty he suffered. Dreaming of a husband running on green land in a dream may indicate repentance for the sins and disobedience committed by the husband, and God knows best. When you see your wife lying on green land in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in your life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish for the husband in a dream: Eating fish in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband may have during this period. If a woman sees that her husband was eating fish, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in his life during this period. Seeing him eating fish in a dream may indicate happy events that the husband may receive in the coming days. If a person sees himself eating fish in a dream This may indicate that he is afflicted with a disease, and then he will get rid of it at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream: A husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate that he will obtain a lot of halal money during this period. Eating his wife’s meat in a dream It could indicate attaining power or promotion at work during this time, and God knows best. If one sees a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream, this may indicate many changes that occur in those days thanks to God. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s meat in The dream may indicate that she is a woman of good character and appearance, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about the husband drinking milk in a dream: If you see the husband eating milk in a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who helps others a lot in their lives. A dream that the husband eats milk in a dream may indicate good The next marriage is with the grace of God. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband was drinking milk, this may indicate that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she has suffered from for a long time. Perhaps seeing her husband eating milk in the dream indicates positive changes that will occur in his life during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s period in a dream: Dreaming about a husband’s menstruation in a dream indicates many good things that will come to him by God’s grace. This vision may be a sign of entering into a new project with a stranger. It is possible that this dream is evidence of blessing and diet. The halal that the husband can obtain, thanks to God. A dream about a husband during his menstrual period may indicate good luck and relief from the worries that he suffered for a while. Interpretation of a dream about buying a mobile phone for the husband in a dream. Buying a new mobile phone in a dream could indicate the husband’s love for those around him, thanks to God. A dream about a husband could indicate that he is buying a serious phone

title: Interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dream about a black woman in a dream in general seems good, and the interpretation of a black girl in a dream in particular has many interpretations and is like other dreams whose interpretation and interpretation varies according to the dream of its owner. Social, psychological and health, as the interpretation of a single vision cannot be generalized. In the following article.Interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream. If one sees a black woman in a dream and that woman is wearing white clothes in the dream, this means that the dreamer will face many problems and sorrows that will be removed from him. If a woman wears black clothes, this indicates sadness and major problems. That the dreamer will face and feel anxiety, insecurity and comfort. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream that this indicates that the dreamer is waiting for happy news and that there are good things that will happen to him in a short time. However, some dream interpreters believe that seeing a black woman in The dream is undesirable, as this indicates that the dreamer is moving in the wrong direction and needs to rethink his path and approach to life, but this interpretation is weak. If the dreamer sees that he is talking to a black woman in a dream, this is evidence that some things Pleasant things will happen to the dreamer in a short period of time. Interpretation of a man seeing a black woman in a dream: In the event that a man sees in a dream that he is talking to a black woman, then this vision is something praiseworthy and beloved, as this dream shows that the dreamer’s life will change for the better and indicates the arrival of good news, And that he will make fateful decisions that will change his life for the better. If a man sees in a dream a woman adorning herself and wearing beautiful clothes, this means that many good things await him and this dream is considered better than seeing an unadorned woman in a dream. Seeing a man in a dream of an unadorned veiled woman Evidence that there are many hidden things that the dreamer does not know about, and that there are many things going on behind him that he does not know anything about. A beautiful woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain large sums of money in the future. In the event that a man sees in a dream that he is arguing and quarreling with a woman In a dream, the dreamer is going through a state of sadness. If the woman the dreamer sees is old, then his vision indicates that he will miss some good things in his life, and if this woman is thin, then this symbolizes that this year that has passed for the dreamer will be a happy year. If a man sees in a dream a strong woman issuing many orders, this indicates the stability and justice of the dreamer. To interpret more dreams, you can use the Live Dreams application.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car in a dream Seeing a car in a dream in detail Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car in a dream on the Moments website and I hope that everything you are looking for is on our website here. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing eggs Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream Seeing the dreamer driving an unfamiliar car means that The situation will be conveyed to the dreamer. Seeing a dilapidated car in a dream may indicate the dreamer's poor life among the people. Seeing a taxi with a familiar font indicates the possession of food and kindness. A small-sized carriage in the dream indicates little living that the dreamer will earn. The dreamer who skillfully drives a carriage in The dream is evidence that he enjoys self-independence and knows how to manage his affairs in life. Seeing a luxurious car in the latest model in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a strong personality. However, seeing an old car in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s weak personality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fast car in a dream It carries a sign that he has a lot of energy and vital activity, whether in the practical field or in his life. As for the dreamer who sees a slow car in a dream, it is evidence of the dreamer’s negative energy that he does not know how to eliminate. Hearing the sound of the engine assigned to the car or the smoke coming from it. In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer is facing a state of financial and romantic instability and does not know how to overcome it. Interpretation of a dream about a carriage for single women. Seeing a carriage for unmarried women in a dream is good news for marriage soon. A car in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a family meeting. Interpretation of a dream about carriage For a married woman: Seeing a car for a married woman in a dream indicates moving to a better financial situation. Also, seeing a carriage in a married woman’s dream indicates ease in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees a carriage in her dream is a sign of the good that she will soon achieve in her life. Also, seeing a car in a dream means hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnant woman’s car in a dream as evidence of the birth of a male child. Seeing a beautiful car for a pregnant woman is evidence of the newborn’s kindness and good morals. Interpretation of a dream about a car for one person. The Nabulsi scholar reported that he saw a car in a dream, which indicates On the marriage that takes place very quickly, because the car is a group of two people or it is the road of life. Also, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a car for a single woman indicates the extent to which she enjoys psychological comfort and that she is cooperative and helps people in many things. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident If you see a car accident in a dream This indicates a fear of life issues. Also, seeing a car accident in a dream means competition at work and victory over competitors. Interpretation of a dream about stealing cars: Seeing a car stolen in a dream indicates the dreamer’s failure in many of the matters entrusted to him. Some scholars interpreted the vision of car theft as It is an indication that the dreamer is wasting a lot of time without much benefit. As for the dreamer’s vision of the person stealing the car, it is evidence of a friend’s advice that causes the dreamer many problems.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly girl in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ugly girl in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about marrying without an ugly girl in a dream could be a sign of financial crises, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself marrying an ugly woman, this may lead to crises and problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see marriage to an ugly woman, it could be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. If an unmarried young man dreams of marrying an ugly woman, this may indicate the problem he faces in achieving goals, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about marrying a non-believer in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about marriage Who is a non-believer in a dream? We did not find clear explanations to see that. However, seeing a Christian marriage indicates the arrival of goodness and living, and God knows what is not seen. If the dreamer sees himself married to a Christian, this may lead to marriage to a non-committed person, and God knows the unseen. When you see marrying a Christian, this may indicate achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about marrying someone you love in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about marrying someone you love in a dream could be a sign of good things. When you see marrying someone you love, it can express achieving goals. A dream about marrying someone you love also indicates love for this person, and God knows what is unseen. When you see a single girl marrying someone you love, this may indicate her commitment to the relationship, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a close person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a close person in a dream and marrying a familiar person It could be a sign of his love, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer dreams of marrying a familiar person, this may lead to him falling in love and hiding his feelings, and God knows the unseen. In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself getting married to a relative, this may be good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about marriage without a desire to Interpretation of a dream about marriage without desire in a dream could be a sign of rejection of a job or work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a forced marriage, this may indicate his rejection of a job, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a forced marriage, this may indicate responsibility, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about marriage. From someone I do not know in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about marrying someone I do not know in a dream could be a sign of nourishment, and God knows best. When you see a single girl marrying someone you do not know, this can lead to goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer dreams that he is marrying someone who does not know He knows him. This may be a sign of success and highness, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees herself marrying someone she does not know, she can express that God protects her from all harm, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover In a dream, we did not find specific meanings to see this, but rejecting marriage can lead to psychological problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see denial of preaching, it can lead to psychological crises, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express a rejection of some nature, and God knows the unseen.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing rice in a dream?

preview.html: Rice in a dream Many people wonder what it refers to in terms of connotations and meanings for them, and given the multiplicity of interpretations related to this topic, we have presented this article to clarify many of them, so let us read below to learn about the most important interpretations of this dream. Rice in a dream indicates the dreamer’s vision For rice in a dream indicates that he is making a very great effort to be able to provide a decent life for his family and provide them with all the comforts. If one sees rice in his dream that has been cooked, this indicates that he will soon obtain a lot of money from clean sources and away from malicious tricks. In If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is cooking rice, this expresses the great effort he is making to get rid of the many problems he is facing at that time. For the dreamer to see in a dream, rice in large quantities around him, symbolizes the abundant goodness that he will enjoy in his life in the coming period. Rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees rice in a dream as a sign of the abundance of money that he will soon obtain from his work, which will flourish on a large scale. In case the dreamer sees rice in his hands in his dream, this is a sign of the great hardship he spends to obtain On his daily livelihood. If one sees in his dream that he is eating rice, this indicates that he will be able to get rid of the things that made him feel very uncomfortable and he will be more comfortable in the coming days. The dreamer seeing ripe rice in his dream is a sign of a happy family life that He enjoys it and his desire not to disturb his life. What is the interpretation of rice in a dream for a single woman? Rice in a dream for a single woman indicates that he was preparing at that time to attend the wedding of a close friend of hers. If the dreamer sees local rice in her dream, this is a sign of the many money that she will receive On her in the coming days, which will make her achieve everything she dreams of. Seeing a girl in her dream about rice with milk symbolizes that she will receive a marriage offer from a person whom she cannot refuse at all and will be happy in her life with him. Seeing the dreamer in her dream eating rice indicates To the many difficulties and problems that she will face and that will put her in a very bad psychological state. What is the interpretation of seeing rice in a dream for a married woman? Rice in a dream for a married woman It symbolizes the great effort that she makes to provide all the comforts for her husband and children. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is preparing rice for food This is a sign of many good things that will enter her life in the coming days. Watching a woman sleeping for rice indicates that her husband will receive a lot of money, which will greatly help in improving their living conditions. If the dreamer sees rice in her dream with sand and dust in it, This expresses the many differences that were prevalent in her relationship with her husband at that time, and things may deteriorate and reach the point of final separation. Interpretation of a dream about white rice for a married woman: A married woman’s dream in a dream about

title: Interpretation of seeing an apple tree for a pregnant woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an apple tree for a pregnant woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. And with the relationship of these dreams to what awaits you in terms of the suffering of childbirth and caring for a newborn, so in this article today they will learn together about the interpretation of seeing an apple tree for a pregnant woman in a dream according to the interpretation. Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing an apple tree in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing an apple tree in a dream in general, and seeing apples of any color means children. As for seeing apples eating apples, this is a sign of abundant nutrition and an abundance of goodness. It also means the owner of dream. Eating with children according to the number of apples eaten, as the dream of apples was interpreted as the great status and position of the dreamer in relation to those around him, and Ibn Sirin confirmed that a man’s dream of apples is a sign of love. A woman who sees apples in a dream means self-respect and dignity. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green apple for a pregnant woman in a dream. Dream interpreters agreed that seeing an apple for a pregnant woman varies according to the taste and color of the apple. A green apple in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a quick recovery from illness and also it means childbirth. Easy, without fatigue or difficulty. As for a red apple in a pregnant woman’s dream, it means the birth of a baby girl, and a sweet apple shows the ease of pregnancy without problems and difficulties, while a bitter apple accompanies pregnancy. Because of severe pain and difficulty.Interpretation of a dream of seeing a red apple for a married woman: A dream about apples in general, and red apples in particular for a crowned woman, means a good, long and happy married life, and plenty of food, if the apples are not yellow, rotten, or rotten. Big goals and ambitions, and for a married woman to see her husband eating apples, this means that she has successfully approached pregnancy, as stated in the interpretation of a dream about apples for a married woman that she gets rid of marital problems and heals them. Any disease. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a red apple in a dream for a single woman. Eating red apples in a dream for an unmarried girl means marrying a suitable man who is distinguished by his high morals, and for an unmarried girl buying apples from the store, this means that she will obtain a great, large and wide benefit from whoever lives, and depends. The amount of livelihood depends on the number of apples, and eating red apples in a dream means that an unmarried girl will achieve great success in her academic and professional life. This also means big profit in the near future. A red apple can mean that an unmarried girl is jealous of the girl she loves. Dream interpreters have confirmed that giving an apple in a dream to an unmarried girl means achieving a distant goal that was difficult to achieve or a desire that was difficult to achieve, and an unmarried girl taking a yellow apple means a loss. Great or wrong decision. Interpretation of a dream of a man seeing an apple tree in a dream. Apples in a man’s dream mean following a large diet or getting a lot of money, and a merchant who sees apples in a dream means a large profit, regardless of the color of the apples, with the exception of blue apples.
